main event: Observers watched three objects in the sky for several hours and thirty minutes. The objects moved in a triangle pattern except in a square pattern. The main body of light was flashing and changing colors.
interesting points: The objects moved across the sky from the south to the northeast, compared to stars but they were flashing.
The objects had a 25-30 foot apparent size and the observers said a match would have covered most of the object in the sky.
The objects made a rattling, humming, or buzzing sound.
The objects seemed to vanish while being watched.
The objects were also seen by the observer's 17-year-old wife, father, and mother at the same address.
sighted object: three flashing, multi-colored objects in the sky
witnesses: civilian observers, including the reporter and their family members
